main event: An observation of a bright light hovering near the ground that climbed rapidly, leaving a trail of light before disappearing on March 12, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as a large luminous object observed near Hidden Valley, The sighting occurred just after 5:25 P.M., The object made a slight whining noise but was otherwise silent, The speed of the object was estimated to be in excess of 700 mph, No visible trail or exhaust was seen during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light hovering in the sky
witness description: a man of legal intelligence and his secretary
